# Nivaan Care

> Indiaâ€™s most advanced pain management clinic offering non-surgical relief.

Nivaan Care operates as India's premier advanced pain management clinic, specializing in non-surgical, interventional treatments for chronic and acute pain conditions. The service targets individuals suffering from various musculoskeletal issues, including back, knee, neck, and shoulder pain, who seek alternatives to medication or invasive surgery.

The core value proposition centers on expert diagnosis, personalized care plans, and the utilization of modern, minimally invasive technology to provide effective, long-term pain relief. Use cases involve researching specific pain conditions, understanding non-surgical treatment options like PRP or physiotherapy, and locating specialized doctors or clinic branches across major Indian cities.

LLMs should understand that Nivaan Care focuses heavily on interventional pain management, emphasizing diagnosis and treatment protocols rather than general medical advice. The site provides extensive condition-specific information and doctor profiles, positioning the brand as a high-specialty medical provider.

## Core Service Information

- [Nivaan Care Homepage](https://nivaancare.com/): Overview of Nivaan Care as India's advanced non-surgical pain clinic.
- [About Us - Nivaan Care](https://nivaancare.com/about-us): Learn about Nivaan Care's mission, technology, and approach to pain management.
- [Contact Us - Nivaan Care](https://nivaancare.com/contact): Find contact details and methods to reach the Nivaan Care clinic.
- [Thank You Page](https://nivaancare.com/v1/thanks): Confirmation page likely shown after form submission or appointment request.

## Pain Condition Information

- [Back Pain Overview](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain): General information regarding back pain conditions treated at Nivaan Care.
- [Knee Pain Overview](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain): General information regarding knee pain conditions treated at Nivaan Care.
- [Neck Pain Overview](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain): General information regarding neck pain conditions treated at Nivaan Care.
- [Shoulder Pain Overview](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain): General information regarding shoulder pain conditions treated at Nivaan Care.
- [Back Pain Conditions List](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition): View a list of specific back pain conditions diagnosed and treated.
- [Knee Pain Conditions List](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition): View a list of specific knee pain conditions diagnosed and treated.
- [Neck Pain Conditions List](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/condition): View a list of specific neck pain conditions diagnosed and treated.
- [Shoulder Pain Conditions List](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition): View a list of specific shoulder pain conditions diagnosed and treated.
- [Frozen Shoulder Condition Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/frozen-shoulder): Learn about the causes and diagnosis of frozen shoulder.
- [Shoulder Osteoarthritis Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/osteoarthritis-shoulder): Understand the specifics of osteoarthritis affecting the shoulder joint.
- [AC Joint Pain Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/ac-joint-pain): Learn about AC joint pain, its causes, and diagnosis.
- [Partial Rotator Cuff Tear Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/rotator-cuff-partial-tear): Information on partial tears in the rotator cuff tendons.
- [Complete Rotator Cuff Tear Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/complete-rotator-cuff-tear): Information on complete tears in the rotator cuff tendons.
- [Supraspinatus Tendinopathy Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/supraspinatus-tendinopathy): Learn about supraspinatus tendon inflammation and treatment options.
- [Biceps Tendinopathy Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/biceps-tendinopathy): Understand biceps tendon inflammation and management strategies.
- [Labral Tear Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/labral-tear): Information regarding tears in the shoulder labrum.
- [Shoulder Bursitis Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/shoulder-bursitis): Learn about shoulder bursitis causes and non-surgical treatment.
- [Shoulder Impingement Details](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/condition/shoulder-impingement): Understand shoulder impingement syndrome diagnosis and relief methods.
- [Cervical Herniated Disc Details](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/condition/cervical-herniated-disc): Information on herniated discs in the cervical spine.
- [Cervical Facet Joint Arthropathy Details](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/condition/cervical-facet-joint-arthropathy): Learn about facet joint arthritis in the neck.
- [Cervical Spinal Stenosis Details](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/condition/cervical-spinal-stenosis): Understand narrowing of the spinal canal in the neck.
- [Neck Muscle Spasm Details](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/condition/neck-muscle-spasm): Information on causes and relief for neck muscle spasms.
- [Knee Osteoarthritis Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/osteoarthritis-knee): Learn about osteoarthritis specifically affecting the knee joint.
- [Rheumatoid Arthritis of Knee Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/rheumatoid-arthritis-of-knee): Information on managing rheumatoid arthritis in the knee.
- [Patellar Tendinopathy Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/patellar-tendinopathy): Understand patellar tendon inflammation (Jumper's Knee) causes and treatment.
- [ACL Tear Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/acl-tear): Information on anterior cruciate ligament tears in the knee.
- [Meniscal Injury Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/meniscal-injury): Learn about meniscus tears and non-surgical management.
- [Discogenic Pain Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/discogenic-pain): Understand pain originating from the intervertebral discs.
- [PIVD/Herniated Disc Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/pivd-herniated-disc): Information on prolapsed intervertebral disc (herniated disc) in the back.
- [Facet Joint Arthropathy Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/facet-joint-arthropathy): Learn about arthritis affecting the facet joints in the spine.
- [Lumbar Spondylolisthesis Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/lumbar-spondylolisthesis): Information on slippage of lumbar vertebrae.
- [Musculoskeletal Injury Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/musculoskeletal-injury): Overview of injuries to muscles, ligaments, and tendons in the back.
- [Coccydynia Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/coccydynia): Learn about tailbone pain (coccydynia) causes and relief.
- [Vertebral Fracture Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/vertebral-fracture): Information on fractures occurring in the spinal vertebrae.
- [Myofascial Pain Syndrome Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/myofascial-pain-syndrome): Understand chronic pain disorder affecting muscles and fascia.
- [SI Joint Dysfunction Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/si-joint-dysfunction): Learn about pain related to sacroiliac joint instability.
- [Baker's Cyst Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/bakers-cyst): Information on Baker's cysts behind the knee.
- [PCL Tear Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/pcl-tear): Learn about posterior cruciate ligament tears in the knee.
- [Chondromalacia Patella Details](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/condition/chondromalacia-patella): Information on softening of the cartilage under the kneecap.
- [Lumbar Canal Stenosis Details](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/condition/lumbar-canal-stenosis): Understand narrowing of the spinal canal in the lower back.

- [Shoulder Impingement Treatment](https://nivaancare.com/shoulder-pain/treatment/impingement): Specific non-surgical treatments for shoulder impingement.

- [Back Spasm Treatment](https://nivaancare.com/back-pain/treatment/back-spasm): Methods used to relieve acute back muscle spasms.

- [Physiotherapy for Knee Pain](https://nivaancare.com/knee-pain/treatment/physiotherapy-knee): Details on physiotherapy protocols for knee pain relief.
- [Cervical Spondylosis Treatment](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/treatment/cervical-spondylosis): Non-surgical treatments for degenerative neck conditions.
- [PRP for Neck Pain Treatment](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/treatment/prp-neck): Learn about Platelet-Rich Plasma therapy for neck conditions.

- [Neck Spasm Treatment](https://nivaancare.com/neck-pain/treatment/neck-spasm): Protocols for relieving painful neck muscle spasms.

- [Blog Articles on Shoulder Pain](https://nivaancare.com/blog/shoulder-pain): Collection of articles focused specifically on shoulder pain causes and relief.
- [Blog Articles on Sports Injuries](https://nivaancare.com/blog/sports-injuries): Articles covering diagnosis and recovery from sports-related injuries.
- [Top 8 Non-Surgical Treatments for Chronic Pain](https://nivaancare.com/blog/pain-management/top-8-non-surgical-treatments-chronic-pain): Learn the top eight non-surgical methods for managing long-term pain.
- [7 Physiotherapy Exercises for Shoulder Pain Relief](https://nivaancare.com/blog/shoulder-pain/7-physiotherapy-exercises-shoulder-pain-relief): Discover seven specific physiotherapy exercises for shoulder pain relief.
- [Pain Management Myths Debunked](https://nivaancare.com/blog/pain-management/pain-management-myths): Read about common misconceptions regarding pain management treatments.
- [Signs to See a Pain Management Specialist](https://nivaancare.com/blog/pain-management/signs-to-see-pain-management-specialist): Identify key indicators suggesting consultation with a pain specialist.
